entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon with 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 this afternoon. High 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
